Lots of beer, the best beer we had in Spain.  Granted, none of it was Spanish beer, but it was nice to find a place that focused on beer.  I had a very good dunkel, and it was nice of them to give me a half glass for free when the keg kicked.  I also tried a porter that was pretty good.  The beer was from all over the world.   I liked that when you walk in you can see the storage for all the beer through the grate to the basement.
